title: aoluain
author: aoluain
created_time: September 06, 2022, 08:59:24 PMLast edit: November 28, 2022, 10:58:32 PM by aoluain
content: Introducing the BitcoinTalk BITCOIN COLOURING BOOK POSTERPART 1 of 2Whats the deal?The free raffle is the 1st partThe sale of the poster is the 2ndÂ The free raffle is for 7 prints there is only 1 of each print and the winners must colour them inand post them back to me in order to make A1 posters. The prints are from my Bitcoin Colouring Bookand the prints will be send back to the winners with an A1 posterThe posters will have 8 artworks, 7 coloured by the community and 1 left for everyone who buys a poster and wants to make their own markWhat do the 7 winners get? a limited edition 1 of 1 print and a copy of a LIMITED EDITION POSTER the first 7 copies will go the the winners of the raffleThe winners also get to choose which print they want, first winner gets to pick from 8 and so on, last winner gets to choose from 2*I dont know how many posters I will print, no more than 50 anyway and possibly only 21*each copy will be stamped, numbered and signedThe Raffle1 spot per person When all tickets are picked we will start with a block and the last two digits will determine the winners.The only cost the winners will incur is posting their finished work back to me.The WinnersQuote from: aoluain on September 11, 2022, 08:59:51 AMLets start the raffle with Block 753608 - Best of luck everyone!753608 - 5bac6b2ad55ff2519a6d42041aa98013d6f96e97d7f828ef289133170a67da23 1. haloxon - 753618 - 000000000000000000081b9c8eb50f3101ac5dab152c2ad4ed1db2b10986607a - [Design #1 - Genesis]Quote from: haloxon on September 06, 2022, 09:05:20 PM07 haloxonthank youDelivered2. Peak DK -753623 - 000000000000000000049bee7a0b82d1ad20e70d30ac1f8e4e0645ea516d8402 [Design #5 - Bitcoin Day]Quote from: PeakDK on September 06, 2022, 09:16:05 PM#2 Peak DK [COMPLETED]Delivered3. Suzuki Matt - 753624 - 0000000000000000000600cbc210320e70889aef1f32791e9fd0544275d3a0e3[Design #6 Pizza Day]Quote from: Suzuki Matt on September 06, 2022, 09:41:07 PM#03 please - Suzuki Matt. Thank You!Edit: Im not very artistic but I have some crayons lolRETURN LETTERS ........... at 09:51 on 19 September 20224. bitbollo - 753625 - 00000000000000000002bf98cd53b37a9b14eb1ead507088980f6d80ec8bdc19- [Design #8 - To The Moon]Quote from: bitbollo on September 10, 2022, 08:43:53 AM19 bitbolloPlease and thank you Delivered5. MoparMiningLLC - 753641 - 00000000000000000005388b132f8e5d4099afecc0beb0b26903e40abf7dce21 - [Design #7 - Bears and Bulls]Quote from: MoparMiningLLC on September 06, 2022, 11:50:16 PM21 pleaseRETURN LETTERS ........... at 09:48 on 19 September 20226. Hookzup1 - 753,645 - 00000000000000000003175de03cac8f5e5c0ec32dd3ab63f8aa47ad2b33215a - [Design #3 - Oriental]Quote from: Hookzup1 on September 07, 2022, 12:31:09 AM15 hookzup1 I'm definitely not artistic but will give this a shot if I get one Delivered7. rhomelmabini - 753,649 - 0000000000000000000534b130f206f58390f83569d79c3fac006d9b9191dfb6 - [#4 - Revolutionary] Quote from: rhomelmabini on September 07, 2022, 12:14:26 PMI'll pick sweet 16.Thank you!Deliveredhttps://live.blockcypher.com/btc/block/0000000000000000000534b130f206f58390f83569d79c3fac006d9b9191dfb6/
